name: Chicken Wings
description: Spicy BBQ chicken wings with blue cheese dip
longDescription: Our signature chicken wings marinated for 24 hours and grilled to perfection. Served with homemade blue cheese dip and celery sticks.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Grilled cottage cheese with Indian spices
longDescription: Fresh cottage cheese marinated in yogurt and aromatic Indian spices
column9: grilled in tandoor. Served with mint chutney and onion rings.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken in rich tomato gravy
longDescription: A classic North Indian dish made with tender chicken pieces in a rich and creamy tomato-based gravy

name: Dal Makhani
longDescription: Slow-cooked black lentils simmered overnight with rich cream and butter
column9: finished with a tempering of ghee and spices.

name: Fresh Lime Soda
longDescription: Refreshing lime juice mixed with soda water and your choice of sweet or salted seasoning.

name: House Red Wine
longDescription: A full-bodied red wine with notes of blackberry and oak. Perfect pairing with our meat dishes.

name: Gulab Jamun
longDescription: Soft milk-based dumplings soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup. Served warm with a garnish of pistachios.
